languages.text: "Проверяете меня? Я не против". {n}Голос Соломона приобретает особую глубину, даже торжественность:{/n} "Лекс Империалис — это свод законов и слово самого Бога-Императора. Тысячелетиями Его указы собирались и хранились на {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Святой Терре{/g} в Зале Суда вместе с распоряжениями Верховных Лордов. Это одновременно и огромное собрание законов, и священное писание".

"Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."
languages.original_text: "Проверяете меня? Я не против". {n}Голос Соломона приобретает особую глубину, даже торжественность:{/n} "Лекс Империалис — это свод законов и слово самого Бога-Императора. Тысячелетиями Его указы собирались и хранились на {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Святой Терре{/g} в Зале Суда вместе с распоряжениями Верховных Лордов. Это одновременно и огромное собрание законов, и священное писание".

traits.locale_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on Holy Terra, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on Holy Terra, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on Holy Terra, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

languages.text: 「私を試しているのですか？いいでしょう。望むところです」{n}ソロモーンの声には重みが宿り、やがて厳粛さすら加わった。{/n}「レックス・インペリアは、法典であると同時に、神帝陛下ご自身の御言葉でもあります。数千年にわたり、その勅令は{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}聖なる地球{/g}にある『審判の間』に蓄積され、至高卿による命令と共に保管されてきました。それは膨大な勅令の集成であり、同時に聖なる経典なのです」
languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

traits.locale_text: 「私を試しているのですか？いいでしょう。望むところです」{n}ソロモーンの声には重みが宿り、やがて厳粛さすら加わった。{/n}「レックス・インペリアは、法典であると同時に、神帝陛下ご自身の御言葉でもあります。数千年にわたり、その勅令は聖なる地球にある『審判の間』に蓄積され、至高卿による命令と共に保管されてきました。それは膨大な勅令の集成であり、同時に聖なる経典なのです」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mich testen? Soll mir recht sein." {n}Solomornes Ton wird tiefsinnig, fast feierlich:{/n} "Das Lex Imperia ist sowohl ein Gesetzeskodex als auch das Wort des Gottimperators selbst. Seit Jahrtausenden wurden seine Erlasse auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Heiligen Terra{/g} gesammelt und bewahrt – in der Halle des Urteils, neben den Befehlen der Hohen Senatoren. Das Ganze ist sowohl eine gewaltige Sammlung von Edikten wie auch eine heilige Schrift."
languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mich testen? Soll mir recht sein." {n}Solomornes Ton wird tiefsinnig, fast feierlich:{/n} "Das Lex Imperia ist sowohl ein Gesetzeskodex als auch das Wort des Gottimperators selbst. Seit Jahrtausenden wurden seine Erlasse auf dem Heiligen Terra gesammelt und bewahrt – in der Halle des Urteils, neben den Befehlen der Hohen Senatoren. Das Ganze ist sowohl eine gewaltige Sammlung von Edikten wie auch eine heilige Schrift."

languages.text: « Vous entendez donc me tester ? Je n'y vois aucun inconvénient, {n}vous répond Solomorne avant de reprendre d'un ton plus profond, voire solennel.{/n} La Lex Imperialis est à la fois un code juridique et les paroles de l'Empereur-Dieu Lui-même. Durant des millénaires, Ses décrets ont été rassemblés et protégés sur la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Sainte Terra{/g}, dans Son Hall du Jugement, auprès des ordres des Hauts Seigneurs. Cette collection titanesque d'édits forme un texte sacré. »
languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

traits.locale_text: « Vous entendez donc me tester ? Je n'y vois aucun inconvénient, {n}vous répond Solomorne avant de reprendre d'un ton plus profond, voire solennel.{/n} La Lex Imperialis est à la fois un code juridique et les paroles de l'Empereur-Dieu Lui-même. Durant des millénaires, Ses décrets ont été rassemblés et protégés sur la Sainte Terra, dans Son Hall du Jugement, auprès des ordres des Hauts Seigneurs. Cette collection titanesque d'édits forme un texte sacré. »

languages.text: «¿Así que quiere ponerme a prueba? Por mí bien». {n}La voz de Solomorne adquiere un tono más formal, incluso solemne:{/n} «La Lex Imperialis es tanto un códice legal como la palabra del mismísimo Dios Emperador. Durante milenios, Sus decretos se han recopilado y preservado en la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Sagrada Terra{/g}, en la Sala del Juicio, junto con las órdenes de los Altos Señores. Son al mismo tiempo una colección titánica de edictos y un texto sagrado».
languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

traits.locale_text: «¿Así que quiere ponerme a prueba? Por mí bien». {n}La voz de Solomorne adquiere un tono más formal, incluso solemne:{/n} «La Lex Imperialis es tanto un códice legal como la palabra del mismísimo Dios Emperador. Durante milenios, Sus decretos se han recopilado y preservado en la Sagrada Terra, en la Sala del Juicio, junto con las órdenes de los Altos Señores. Son al mismo tiempo una colección titánica de edictos y un texto sagrado».

languages.text: “这是在试探我吗？不过，我不介意。”{n}索罗蒙的语气变得深沉，几乎可以称得上是庄严。{/n}“《帝国法典》既是一部法典，也是神皇本人的话语。几千年来，祂的法令一直保存在{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}神圣泰拉{/g}，存放在审判大厅之中，与众多高阶泰拉领主的命令保存在一起。这部法典既是大部头法律著作，又是无上神圣的教义。”
languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

traits.locale_text: “这是在试探我吗？不过，我不介意。”{n}索罗蒙的语气变得深沉，几乎可以称得上是庄严。{/n}“《帝国法典》既是一部法典，也是神皇本人的话语。几千年来，祂的法令一直保存在神圣泰拉，存放在审判大厅之中，与众多高阶泰拉领主的命令保存在一起。这部法典既是大部头法律著作，又是无上神圣的教义。”

languages.text: "Beni sınıyorsunuz, değil mi? Bana uyar." {n}Solomorne, daha derin bir sesle konuşmaya başlayıp gitgide ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Lex İmperialis, hem hukuki bir kurallar bütünüdür hem de Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri'nin kelamıdır. Binlerce yıldır O'nun hükümlerini {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Kutsal Terra{/g}'da, Yargı Divanı'nda Yüce Lordların emirleriyle beraber toplanmış ve muhafaza edilmiştir. Aynı anda hem devasa bir ferman koleksiyonu hem de kutsal bir metindir."
languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."

traits.locale_text: "Beni test ediyorsunuz, değil mi? Bana uyar." {n}Solomorne daha derin bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor, hatta ciddileşiyor:{/n} "Lex Imperialis hem hukukî bir kurallar bütünüdür hem de Tanrı İmparator Hazretlerinin kelâmıdır. Binlerce yıldır O'nun hükümlerini Kutsal Terra'da, Yargı Divanı'nda, Yüce Lordların emirleriyle beraber toplanmış ve muhafaza edilmiştir. Aynı anda hem devasa bir ferman koleksiyonu hem de kutsal bir metindir."

languages.original_text: "Testing me, are you? That is fine by me." {n}Solomorne's tone becomes profound, even solemn:{/n} "The Lex Imperialis is both a code of law and the word of the God-Emperor Himself. For millennia, His decrees have been amassed and preserved on Holy Terra, in the Hall of Judgement, alongside the High Lords' orders. It is at once a titanic collection of edicts and a holy text."
